channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: The traffic lights timing is off, 7th May
item.description:
The lights were repaired the other week, and after they were repaired the timing has been off causing a build up of traffic in all directions leading to 20-30 minutes of traffic.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kingsditch Lane, Kingsditch, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Traffic light head is facing wrong direction

item.title: Blocked drain, 7th May
item.description:
Blocked drain full of soil and therefore not functioning as a drain should.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Montpellier Terrace, Montpellier, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Blocked drain, 7th May
item.description:
After medium to heavy rain extensive surface remains causing traffic to take evasive action.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Queens Lane, Montpellier, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Blocked drain, 7th May
item.description:
The drain is blocked as are many at all corners of the upper part of Parabola Rd. Also many drains are blocked along Bayshill Road and also the road surface of Bayshill Road is absolutely shocking and needs to be addressed. In fact I'm extremely surprised its been allowed to get in such a state due to the hotels and ladies college being on its route.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Parabola Road, Montpellier, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: No rain in 24 hours - water has increased or remained the same

item.title: Long rough patch - could cause serious injury to motorcyclists, 7th May
item.description:
A40 between golden Valley roundabout and m5 turn off
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A40, Hatherley, Cheltenham

item.title: Blocked drain, 7th May
item.description:
Drain blocked with soil and causes surface water after medium to light rain. If cycling this cause the rider to take evasive action.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 67, Rodney Road, Montpellier, Cheltenham

item.title: Blocked drain, 7th May
item.description:
Blocked drain which after medium to heavy rain causes extensive surface water upto the middle of the highway. The drain some 10 yards around the corner onBath Road is also blocked as in the one at the pedestrian crossing opposite the blocked drain on Suffolk Rd.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2, Suffolk Road, Montpellier, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

Pot holes all along this stretch
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Sevenhampton, Cotswold

item.title: Re-opened large pothole leaving huge amounts of debris on road., 6th May
item.description:
Opposite 38 Whittington Road, in the middle of the street.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 38, Whittington Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham

item.title: Dangerous road, 6th May
item.description:
This road is now dangerous, cars are weaving in and out of the uneven road surface and nearly crashing into parked cars and oncoming cars. Wheels and tyres are being damaged! We keep being told this isn't urgent or a priority! Why? It's a main and busy road!!!!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 265, Priors Road, Lynworth, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: A40 Bridge wall collapse over river chelt, 6th May
item.description:
Wall collapse on London rd bridge over river chelt. Huge hole in pavement. Notified by c/kings Facebook site Looks very dangerous
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 267a, London Road, Charlton Kings, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Ongoing issues, 6th May
item.description:
22-21 Glebe road Ongoing issues which need rectifying asap Next issue will be houses flooded and my insurance will act accordingly

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 7, Glebe Road, Lynworth, Cheltenham

item.title: Drain blocked on both sides of road., 6th May
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Glenfall Way, Charlton Kings, Cheltenham

item.title: Blocked gullies on both sides of the road, 6th May
item.description:
15-20m onto Noverton lane after mini roundabout and opposite no2 Noverton lane. Drainage gullies on both sides of the road blocked and causing flooding
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Noverton Lane, Noverton, Cheltenham

item.title: Blocked drain, 6th May
item.description:
Immediately outside the driveway of 29 The Park, GL50 2SE. It is adjacent to the roundabout warning sign which also needs resetting as it was turned to enable road resurfacing but never reset! I have previously been told there is no issue with this drain being blocked, but every time we have rainfall the road floods.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 29, The Park, Warden Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Blocked drain., 6th May
item.description:
Drain outside 2 Liddington Road gate. Drain always full never seems to go down. Have reported before and had never got any better. Needs much further investigation. The problem has never been solved.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2, Liddington Road, Leckhampton, Cheltenham
